column4: riq: edit /etc/X11/xorg.conf and in your Device section, change driver to "fglrx"
if it's set to fglrx then it's loaded
strange riq_: what video card do you have?
did you install those drivers from the restricted drivers list?
downloaded from a website .. i followed a tutorial
is this the guide you used? http://www.phoronix.com/scan.php?page=article&item=843&num=1
should i try the one you mentioned?
what does this return: cat /var/log/Xorg.0.log | grep R6
yeah, its not even seeing your card then
the guide you followed is pretty old, i guess you could try mine
unless you are running feisty fawn
